This week we'll continue our study of physician agency and treatment decisions, focusing in particular on fee-for-service payments, with Medicare or Medicaid in mind.

### Objectives for this week

- Define fee-for-service payments
- Briefly discuss the Medicare prospective payment system
- Solve for treatment levels with fixed prices
 
### Activities
- In-class problem on physician agency with fixed prices. The worksheet is [here](/resource/wksheet5.html)
- **The Incidental Economist** on [Upcoding](https://theincidentaleconomist.com/wordpress/upcoding-pt-one-what-and-how/)
- Weekly check-in on Friday
